thread.title: Teens are using 'Fortnite' to ask out prom dates

author: cnbc.com
title: Teens are using 'Fortnite' to ask out prom dates
text:
Here's one way to ask out a potential prom date: Build her a digital fort.
Thanks to Fortnite — the popular video game that's part Hunger Games , part Minecraft — many teens have found a new way to craft their "promposals."
Reddit user Navypython shared video footage of the game , which includes a massive structure in front of his in-game character. After setting off a series of explosives, the structure eventually spells out the phrase "PROM?"
The trend was first spotted by video game site Polygon .
Based on a search on Twitter, other students have also attempted the in-game "promposal."

Tweet 

Tweet 

Tweet 

Some teens have also turned to the more traditional ways to incorporate Fortnite into their "promposals."

Tweet 

Tweet 

Tweet 

Fortnite has been a huge deal since a free version of the game called Fortnite Battle Royale debuted last year. Each match drops 100 players on an island, with the last person standing declared the winner.
